LanguageData.TableOrgans.label: tissue printer
LanguageData.TableOrgans.description: A fabrication workstation, equipped with a 3D printer to craft organs. This advanced workbench is capable of assisting certain workstations by sharing some of its specialized fabrication system when placed near them.\n\nWhen placed near a bionic table or fabrication bench, this workbench is able to increase their production speed. They can connect to a maximum of one tissue printer.
